org.openimaj.image.pixel

Class IntValuePixel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel
      • org.openimaj.image.pixel.ValuePixel<Integer>
        • org.openimaj.image.pixel.IntValuePixel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Coordinate, Point2d

    public class IntValuePixel
extends ValuePixel<Integer>
    Represents a pixel location. This is basically the same as java.awt.Point except we can control exactly what goes in here to optimise for memory usage.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
